title: [Yegharren Valley, Trail]
description: Chipmunks and beetles scurry for shelter in the stands of ferns that line both sides of the trail as it winds up the sloping hillside to the northwest.  A dogwood tree spreads its delicate branches over the path, its snowy blossoms glistening in the sparse moonlight.

Chipmunks and beetles scurry for shelter in the stands of ferns that line both sides of the trail as it winds up the sloping hillside to the northwest.  A dogwood tree spreads its delicate branches over the trail, dropping a patch of snowy blossoms on the blanket of dirt and fallen leaves.
